release.action: Added mojo configuration parameter hashDirectory. Updated the mojo to create hash files for any generated bundle and to use these hash files to decide if a bundle needs to get regenerated.
Updated the generate-bundles goal adding resource validation code into generated bundle classes.

Updated to use velocity for generating sources. Removed any cacheing from the generated bundle code. Removed any static modifiers from the generated bundle code and added a static getInstance() method. Note:Generated code will not be compatible with code generated by previous versions of the plugin.
